Absolute.origin: [rights that even seem have these qualifications " Long v. Rockwood , 277 U.S. 142 (1927)"]

1 a.definition: free from qualification, condition, exception, or restriction [rights that even seem have these qualifications ", 277 U.S. 142 (1927)"] see alsoatcompare

sub_terms.b: having or allowing no legal effect [an impediment]

2.definition: final and not liable to modification sometimes used after the word it modifies [divorce ] compare
